description: 工作内容： 与PWPH中国区标准品销售经理合作沟通，以达成目标 根据年度目标和预算，开发拓展新的经销商，代理商，完成渠道业务目标 依照莱丹中国的流程及业务特点，协助销售经理制定经销商，代理商管理政策 维护及支持现有经销商，代理商，实现每年的销售目标 协助销售经理设定公司渠道战略计划, 制定经销商，代理商标准，价格体系和相关政策 上级和公司指派的其他相关工作或任务  任职资格 机械、机电或塑料工程专业 5年以上在各个工业领域设备/工具直销和经销商管理经验，优先考虑以下行业：市政工程（土工膜相关），屋面及防水，塑料地板，塑料加工，广告幕布和防水布等 必须有经销商、代理商的开发经验 具有支持经销商、代理商一起完成项目的能力，包括产品培训，演示，协助方案完成，售后等 良好的沟通能力和人际交往能力 良好的英语口语和书面沟通能力 熟练使用办公软件
1、本科及以上学历，国贸、英语、机械相关专业（理工类专业优先）； 2、至少2年以上机械行业国际市场销售经验，熟悉阀门行业优先考虑； 3、精通国际贸易业务，能够独立开发和维护大型外商客户； 4、英语熟练，能够熟练进行听说和读写； 5、良好的沟通协调能力，抗压力强； 6、具有一定的组织领导能力，能够管理一个团队；

Summary  This position plays a key role in creating and developing opportunities for new business by generating qualified leads for the ANSYS, Inc. sales team. The focus is to nurture leads with the intent of delivering qualified opportunities to sales based on predetermined criteria. In addition to lead generation and development, the Sales Development Representative is responsible for engaging customers during ANSYS event and tradeshows, updating the CRM databases with information gathered with every prospect contact. Lead development responsibilities require significant engagement (i.e. email and tele-prospecting) in a business to business environment and use of internet/internal database resources to identify and profile new customers. The Sales Development Representative is an active team player, fostering sales and marketing collaboration and alignment towards joint goals.  Responsibilities Support the lead routing and administration process at ANSYS Follow up on prospect inquiries concerning ANSYS software products Research, identify and create new market opportunities through targeted engagement into prospect accounts, speaking with key decision makers to create and develop interest in ANSYS software Engage current accounts to expand awareness, education, referral networks, new opportunities and develop account intelligence Effectively partner and work across the Marketing, Sales and Product teams Work closely with key internal teams to develop account intelligence, relationship maps, and use case opportunities through direct account engagement and insight tools Leverage marketing campaigns (marketing material, seminar, webinar etc.) to develop and nurture leads to opportunity Schedule meetings, appointments and demos Apply sales and technical expertise required to identify leads and pass them to the appropriate opportunity owner Participate in ANSYS events, trade-shows and digitally led customer engagement programs. Drive attendance to ANSYS events in assigned territory Update the CRM database or other databases with lead and/or contact info and account/prospect intelligence gathered in order to provide visibility to market opportunities in assigned territory Provide market feedback to the management team to optimize positioning of offerings Develop and communicate ongoing improvements to the process of prospecting for and qualifying leads Work on special projects as directed by the Director, Global Sales Development and Lead Management Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s degree required preferably in business, marketing or engineering. 0-3 years’ experience in inside sales function, sales or presales environment of complex technical / industrial products Experience working in a sales and/or customer relations environment Technical aptitude and/or experience in an industrial/technical sales environment Excellent record of customer service and customer satisfaction Skilled at initiating phone discussions and overcoming objections Strong prospecting and lead qualification skills Ability to leverage social media to identify and engage with key decision makers Understanding of sales automation tools (SalesForce.com experience is a plus) and the sales process Outstanding written and verbal communication skills in local language (Chinese) Highly self-motivated and results driven Preferred Qualifications Well-organized, self-directed team player. Remains open to others’ ideas and exhibits willingness to try new things Able to assess business opportunities based on predetermined criteria in order to align opportunities with sales Able to understand industry issues and apply software value statements in order to engage with prospective customers in a meaningful and mutually beneficial manner Ability to formulate communication strategies based on behavior style tendencies Ability to engage with prospective customers based on open probes and creation of value statements Establish and maintain credibility with the internal sales team and prospective customers Effectively communicate value by getting past the gate-keeper and overcoming objections. Adapts to changes in the work environment, manages competing demands and can deal with frequent change, delays or unexpected events Prioritizes and plans work activities, uses time efficiently and develops realistic action plans Willing to take direction, engage in training and apply techniques and constructive criticism to improve performance Demonstrates accuracy and thoroughness and monitors own work to ensure quality and can read and interpret written information Demonstrates professionalism, discretion, and good judgment in all interactions with co-workers, customers, vendors and others Consistently at work on time, follows instructions, responds to management direction
industries: Computer Software

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  公司介绍：  Airwallex（空中云汇）是一家跨境金融独角兽。成立于2015年，Airwallex致力于构建数字化的全球金融基础设施，提供智能、无缝的跨境支付解决方案。产品包括跨境交易中的收款、全球支付和货币汇率管理等。目前拥有跨境电商、在线旅游、物流、教育与留学、金融机构、数字营销、线上娱乐等领域的客户。  Airwallex自成立以来获得投资机构超4亿美元融资，包括腾讯、红杉资本中国基金、DST Global、高瓴创投、维港投资、ANZi Ventures、Square Peg Capital、戈壁创投和Salesforce Ventures等国内外投资机构的支持。 2020年7月，Airwallex空中云汇宣布阿里巴巴创业者基金（Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund）作为新的投资人参与到D+轮融资，加速公司对于产品、服务规模和生态体系的扩建。  工作职责 负责创新领域（海外电商/广告/OTA平台、专注跨境赛道明星初创公司、国内外大型消费品企业、国内外大型制造业企业、zqoq等）战略级客户关系的拓展及维护；定期拜访客户管理层，与相关负责人建立起长期的良好合作关系； 深入洞察客户在跨境金融领域方面的诉求，与Airwallex内部产品、研发等相关团队一同制定跨境金融解决方案； 协调大型项目的落地、执行，完成销售额、回款、利润等相关业绩指标；持续跟进客户，识别二次/向上/交叉等销售机会，实现公司与客户的长期互利共赢； 参与销售策略讨论，提供基于客户的行业观点，与相关部门一起，制定Airwallex在创新领域的市场竞争策略。 任职要求： 全日制本科学历，优先考虑信息，金融，外贸，经济，计算机等相关专业； 具有5年以上管理咨询、VC/投资顾问、技术咨询、SaaS软件销售或2B行业经验；优先考虑拥有财务、金融、外贸、或跨境/海外工作经验候选人 具备良好的沟通和表达能力，掌握顾问式营销方法与技能，能够通过有效地演讲和谈判呈现公司产品和服务，赢得客户的认可并与客户保持长期友好的合作关系； 热爱销售工作，具备快速学习能力；有良好的团队合作意识、较强的抗压性；自我有较高的要求，追求卓越，愿意不断投入来提升自己的能力和专业度，能够承受较大工作压力； 对于金融科技领域有热情。
industries: Internet

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Jobs at this level operate with some autonomy but are covered by well-defined Commercial policies or review of end results. The job allows modification of procedures and practices covering work as long as the end results meet standards of acceptability (typically annual volume, margin and compliance requirements). Responsible for medium-sized sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  角色与职责 向指定客户销售时，新增客户通常很少，并且通常需要经过审查。包括单个业务组/P&L 中的关键客户。 利用自身和他人的销售领域、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户群的深入知识，并运用分析思维和商业经验来执行政策/策略。 具有最佳实践知识以及了解自己的领域如何与他人融合；了解竞争以及在市场上与众不同的因素 运用判断力，并具有在设定参数之外提出不同解决方案的能力，以解决项目、产品线、市场、销售流程或客户的更复杂的日常问题。为决策制定信息优先级的能力。利用技术经验和分析思维。使用多种内部资源和自身团队之外有限的外部资源来帮助做出决定。 这些销售职位将主要由个人贡献者担任。 此级别的职位需要强大的人际交往能力。充当经验较少的同事的资源。可能会领导具有低风险和资源需求的小型项目。说明信息；培养使团队成员就领域的话题达成共识的技能。传达绩效期望，并可以处理敏感问题。  任职条件:  基本资格  该岗位要求在领域具有较丰富的工作经验。学历水平相当于从正规高等院校取得学士学位 （或根据相应工作经验具有高中学历）  所需特性  优秀的口头和书面沟通能力。优秀的人际关系和领导能力。能够影响他人并领导小型团队。领导中等范围和影响的计划。能够同时协调多个项目。有效的问题识别和解决技能。可靠的分析和组织能力。  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: When you are part of the team you’ll do important work, like helping customers in finding cures for cancer, protecting the environment or making sure our food is safe. Your work will have real-world impact, and you’ll be supported in achieving your career goals.  Responsibilities Plan, organize and manage a sales territory. Actively develop and target new business/sales opportunities within the marketplace. Manage the sales cycle. Effectively communicate and negotiate sales contracts with customers. Educate customers on new products and product enhancements. Accurately articulate and present product features and benefits. Work closely with sales manager on territory business planning and implementation. Actively communicate customer issues, current prospects and marketing events to management team. Interpret and manage key financial result areas, i.e. revenues, volume, days outstanding and forecasting. Requirements Bachelor or Master majoring in industry-specific experience, preferably in the experience from Clinical, Diagnosis or related Life Science industries At least 5 years selling experience; working experience in biotech, Pharm or kits companies is highly preferred. Good presentation, interpersonal and negotiation skills. Excellent communication skills to deal with scientific discussion with customers. Good English communications in both oral and written. Good data analysis and biz planning skills. High energy, team player and capability of working under pressure.

description: *Local Sales Representative, Part-Time，Flexible，Working at Home*  At Polymer, we would be nothing without our successful sales team.  We are now seeking several local sales reps to help us sell the products and services that our customers have grown to rely on. The sales representative is mainly responsible for severing retailers from your town who are interested in B2B business. This position offers considerable profit from each successful order.

About This Role  As the Director of Business Development -Mobile you will broaden our current relationships with our mobile clients, create new opportunities sourced from your large mobile gaming network, and develop a pipeline of business opportunities. In the office you will be a reliable resource for all employees by demonstrating your expert knowledge and sharing ideas. Outside of the office you will be a strong leader in your field with great communication skills. As an individual you are reliable, a self starter, and trustworthy.  Core Job Functions/Responsibilities Primary point of contact for global partners in designated markets. Approve and assist with negotiating strategic deals with developers and partners to increase Xsolla’s presence in assigned markets. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to grow the mobile gaming business. Analyze key partner metrics to understand the health of developer mobile businesses. Based on the metrics, gives direction to the team on any necessary changes. Ensure your clients success by interfacing closely with your reports and other departments. Create strategy to secure business and close deals. Advocate your ideas in a variety of environments while promoting your team members. Exceed expectations by tapping into your digital game expertise and network. Provide team with feedback, coaching, and development opportunities to help support the team member’s experience as well as to provide a foundation for professional growth. Assist with a variety of projects as business needs dictate. Serve as a conduit of information from corporate to the field. Navigate shifts and trends to develop plans for a successful future. Demonstrate everyday leadership by sharing accomplishments as a team, and inspiring those around you to strive for the best. Required  Knowledge/Expertise/Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Economics, or similar field 8 + years professional experience Have lead teams in the past with successful metrics Must have a passion for games and/or prior experience in the game industry Strong network of gaming professionals Clear written and verbal communication skills Strong negotiation skills Gaming industry knowledge Well connected and experienced in the industry, a large network of industry members Must be able to immediately handle a significant workload and effectively prioritize projects with a high degree of autonomy Effective time management skills and excellent attention to detail Able to work with minimal supervision while achieving a high degree of accuracy and meeting deadlines Inspire and support the career development of your peers Ability to travel internationally up to 30% Preferred Experience with an entrepreneurial organization Size And Complexity Proven track record of successfully managing multiple priorities while maintaining a positive, professional image of the organization Define key performance indicators to set goals for and track the performance of our publishing efforts, and help your teams gain and maintain a data-informed perspective on their work Need to understand specific client needs and problem solve appropriately About Xsolla  Xsolla is the video game commerce company, powered by its Transaction Engine and Business Engine, that helps developers and publishers market, sell, connect and optimize their games globally. Serving only the video game industry, the Xsolla Transaction Engine powers the full suite of cloud-based tools to promote and monetize projects, while Xsolla Business Engine provides clients with the roadmap to maximize those tools, and connect them with industry partnerships to expand their business. The two work seamlessly together -- for businesses of all sizes, from indie to enterprise -- to solve the complexities of distribution, marketing and monetization so they can increase their audience, sales and revenue. Headquartered in Los Angeles, with offices worldwide, Xsolla operates as a merchant and seller of record for major gaming entities like Valve, Twitch, Roblox, Ubisoft, Epic Games and KRAFTON. For more information, please visit www.xsolla.com .  Xsolla is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on the following: Race, color, Ancestry, national origin, Religion, creed, Age (over 40), Disability, mental and physical, Sex, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding or related medical conditions), Sexual orientation, Gender identity, gender expression, Medical condition, Genetic information, Marital status, Military and veteran status, and any other terms deems by the State of California.  Physical Demands  The physical demands for this position are sits, stands, bends, lifts, and moves intermittently during working hours. These physical requirements may be accomplished with or without reasonable accommodations.  The duties of this position may change from time to time so the individual and organization can achieve their results. This job description is intended to describe the general level of work being performed. It is not intended to be all-inclusive.  Xsolla takes your privacy very seriously, and will not sell or externally distribute any data received during the hiring process. For more information related to GDPR or CCPA please reach out to careers@xsolla.com.  L ongevity O pportunity V ision E njoy the game! description: About Airwallex Airwallex is a leading global fintech and enterprise services company founded in 2015, which enables cross-border business to grow globally and innovatively. Airwallex has set up 15 offices around the world, with more than 800 talented employees. At the beginning of 2021, Airwallex completed a D+ series of financing with around 2.6 billion USD valuation. Tencent, Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund, Sequoia Capital, Hillhouse Capital and many other top financial institutions are our investors.    About the Role The Channel Sales Manager/Associate Director is responsible for building partnership network and delivering sales results through channels and agencies. You will work as the primary resource for developing commercial partners and growing relationships and be responsible for educating our channels and their sales team on what Airwallex has to offer and how to position our products to the partners’ clients. Your focus will be sourcing, recruiting and managing new and existing channel partners in order to generate high quality leads and subsequent revenues. It includes the full life cycle of the channel partner sales from prospecting through to commercial and contractual negotiation and signing, followed by nurturing the relationship with those partners.  Job Description The Channel Sales Manager/Director will partner across industries in order to establish networks, develope and manage channels and drive revenue generating activities Recruit new partners, creating new and profitable channels in the market. Mentor and enable relevant partners to accomplish Airwallex’s channel goals Work in close collaboration and partnership with the Sales team and other departments (e.g. Legal, Finance, Marketing, Product). Provide sales enablement to the partner across all relevant disciplines.  Requirements Bachelor’s degree from an established undergraduate institution 3+ year working experiences in channel/distributor/partnership management position with top internet companies (e.g, Alibaba ICBU), cross-border SaaS companies (e.g., ) or relevant finance firms Strong indirect channel management core skills, be able to deliver sales results through others Be able to communicate and work with multiple stakeholders across different teams and areas Be optimistic and good in self-emotion control, with hunger for achievement but humble personality Fluent in both Mandarin and English, capability of excellent data analysis will be a plus  Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters.  Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to specific open position(s).  Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.

description: GENERAL SUMMARY OF POSITION As a Territory Sales Manager, you will focus on business development, prospecting, and execution of sales against the target. In addition, you will work closely with Ansell’s regional sales team to deliver Life-Sciences solutions to the Pharmaceutical and Life-Science market. Crucially you will also provide technical consultancy to our customers and advise on best practices concerning garment and accessory selection for the end-users on a country-wide basis.  RESPONSIBILITIES You will be responsible for the maintenance and growth of your territory for the complete line of Ansell™ and BioClean™ Life-Sciences portfolios. This includes but is not limited to Cleanroom gloves, Garments, Goggles, Wipes, and accessories. Using SFDC you will prospect for new customers and qualify leads, whilst supporting and cooperating with the key accounts (KA) and regional team (RST) on managing end-users and channels. You will provide technical customer support (e.g., SOP recommendation, Documentation prep, and training on all Life-Science products and their applications. You will work collaboratively with the China Industrial KA team, body protection (BP), and RST to facilitate, advise and close Life-Science account opportunities. You will analyze your territory/market potential and prepare sales reports on a routine basis including, but not limited to intelligence on customer projects, volume requirements, problems, areas of interest, competitor activity, and potential for new products. Keep abreast of best practices and industry trends Continuously improve through feedback from management Represent Ansell in a professional and ethical manner Travel up to 50-75% to support sales activities  KEY POSITION REQUIREMENTS  Job Experience Minimum 4-5 years of experience in a similar role within a B2B multinational product environment Proficiency in English BS, in Microbiology, Chemical engineering, Chemistry or any adjacent Life Science discipline Experience: 2-3 years of solution sales experience, technical support, or laboratory experience is preferred Detailed planning and organization skills. Familiarity with CRM practices Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently. A combination of expert troubleshooting and interpersonal skills are the keys to success in this position. Excellent written and verbal communication skills are required. Full, clean driving license  Desirable Job Competencies Analytical and focused on quality Service and Customer-oriented Focus on solution selling Business-minded Strong communication and interpersonal skills Very good organization skills, structured and able to prioritize Proactive, pragmatic, dynamic, and enthusiastic Flexible team player, but who likes to work autonomously
industries: Hospital & Health Care

description: Job Summary  Sales Account Manager position in China Education Sales group based in Beijing. Geographic sales territory consists of university accounts in assigned provinces of China mainland, Macau and Hongkong. He/she will be responsible for developing and managing current account base, increasing revenue results, and product penetration.  Responsibilities  Responsible for selling the company's products and services via telephone and on-site visits. Includes generating and qualifying new prospects, identifying decision makers, determining customer needs and communicating features and benefits, overcoming customer objections and closing sales. Attempts to cross-sell or up-sell each account. Prepares required sales documentation including detailed and thorough account/territory plans, activity reports and forecasts.  Qualifications A bachelor's degree and 3 years of professional work experience (or equivalent experience) is required. Additional Qualifications BA/BS degree 3-5 years of sales experience Knowledge or selling experience of university market a plus. Prior High Tech or technical software sales or engineering products experience preferred Strong verbal and written communication skills required (English/Chinese)

description: This Sales Engineer role is to meet or exceed revenue targets in China. This position will work closely with application and service team, and report to General Manager.  Responsibilities:  Responsible for Life Sciences of area business in China  Efficient of supporting customer base through planned coverage and follow up of key accounts, user and prospects to ensure their success in using SEM Life Science Solution  Provide application consultancy services and technical support to end users in the area of life Science  Conduct seminars, product training and product demonstration and other company related activities  Work closely with Business Development teams to achieve and exceed sales goals, customer expectation and market goals  Collaborate with marketing team to work out program to meet key account in life science market   Requirements:   Degree/Master/PHD in Biochemistry, Biology or related Sciences  Must have at least 2-3 years working experience, preferably in Biopharmaceutical, pharmaceutical or life Science industry or research  Prior laboratory experience using SEM or FIB preferred  Strong customer-orientation with ability in developing and fostering long term effective relationships with key accounts and end users  Ability to leverage on external and internal resources to resolve issues and meet customers needs  Mature disposition, positive attitude and strong sense of commitment  Good interpersonal, communication and presentation skill  Proficient in English and Mandarin  Adaptable to dynamic and changing environment    欢迎加入TESCAN中国！在这里，你将获得→  ❤ 人性化的工作模式，以及极具竞争力的薪资体系 ❤ 五险一金+补充、生日/结婚/生育/等节假日福利、等各种补贴 ❤ 享有额外商业保险以及一次性补贴50万-重大疾病险（子女补充医疗） ❤ 15天带薪年假，不定期团队建设和工会活动，年度国内外旅游机会等 ❤ 幸福有爱的团队文化，贴心的人文关怀

jobTitle: Manager, China Digital and E-commerce Sales
description: Delta's China Sales organization is seeking a highly motivated individual and established leader for the role of Manager - China Digital & E-commerce Sales. This position will have overall responsibilities for growing revenue and market share on Online Travel Agencies, online flagship store, and delta.com. This manager position will also manage B2B communications with brand partners, marketing units, tourism boards, and other industry partners. Based in Shanghai, this position will report to Director of Sales, China  Summary Of Responsibilities (not Comprehensive Of All Tasks) Formulate, execute, and track sales strategies for OTAs, online flagship stores, and delta.com – leveraging social media, mobile platform, localization. Increase digital channel revenue, channel share, and customer satisfaction for delta.com and mobile channels Manage and strengthen relationships with external stakeholders that include but not limited to OTAs, brand partners, tourism boards, and airline partner China Eastern. Manage and strengthen relationships with internal stakeholders such as Revenue Management, Sales Development, Global Distribution unit and other departments involved in key digital sales initiatives and projects. Partner with Marketing and Corporate Communication to proactively build Delta brand and supporting objective to become the Most Chinese-Friendly U.S. Carrier. Develop interpersonal skills and business maturity of team members, while reinforcing Delta’s best practices and employee-focused corporate culture. Minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience in airline, digital sales, online travel agencies, or related e-commerce fields required. Fluency in English and Mandarin is required. Strong written and verbal communication skills with demonstrated ability to speak confidently before large groups and effectively conduct meetings. Excellent relationship management and communication skills, with both internal and external stakeholders. Excellent understanding of the travel industry, market conditions, competitive threats and opportunities, and strong familiarity with online distribution and e-commerce trends – to successfully guide formulation and execution of sales plans targeting online customers. Good leadership and interpersonal skills with a strong track record of working cross-functionally. Must have the ability to exercise sound judgment, be highly motivated, flexible, and able to work under pressure with minimal supervision. Embraces diverse people, thinking and styles Consistently makes safety and security, of self and others, the priority 3+ years of leadership experience in airline, commercial, sales and marketing fields is preferred Knowledge of airline distribution concepts, including GDS and online distribution policies and strategies Preferred knowledge of Delta Air Lines and/or the airline industry, travel landscape, and consumer behavior Must be strategic, dynamic, detail-oriented, and impactful. The ideal candidate is an analytical thinker, a self-starter, and a solution provider Bachelor's degree, MBA or master’s degree preferred.
industries: Airlines/Aviation and Consumer Services

Job Requirements College degree or above, graduates in logistics, foreign trade or foreign language related majors are preferred; Extroverted, responsive, and strong learning ability; Have strong communication, communication skills and communication skills, with affinity; College English level 4 or above; English/Thai/Vietnamese local language is preferred Have certain market analysis and judgment ability, and good customer service awareness; Ability to independently develop and maintain customers and complete the sales task indicators assigned by the company; Ability to deal with international customers Have rapid organizational and coordination capabilities and make full use of all resources. Can make timely adjustments based on market fluctuations and customer psychological fluctuations; Responsible, able to withstand greater work pressure, good at learning and innovation, good execution, good team spirit and sense of collaboration; More than one year working experience in the freight forwarding industry is preferred. description: Innovate to solve the world's most important challenges  工作职责: 面向电子、汽车、家电、机械加工等行业客户，负责工业互联网+智能制造领域解决方案和产品的市场拓展和销售，独立负责客户开发、项目落地、内外部协调、验收回款等全栈业务工作，完成公司要求的销售目标 熟悉工业企业的生产制造、采购和供应链等业务流程，作为顾问式销售，深入挖掘客户需求和痛点，与SA及产研团队配合，制定有针对性的解决方案，并根据客户需求进行方案的讲解和演示 全程参与客户项目的招投标，与SA团队配合完成项目的前期方案规划、标的应答、现场述标，对项目招投标的结果负责 根据智能制造软件产品和解决方案、客户需求及相关行业业态，聚合上下游产业资源，打造健康、可持续发展的产业生态 收集并研究电子 汽车 家电 机械加工等行业的发展方向，以及行业趋势、价值和商业模式，为客户提供创新的业务场景、商业模式实施建议 配合公司不定期组织市场活动，扩大品牌影响力  职责要求: 统招全日制本科及以上学历，5年以上项目销售经验；具备软件产品直销经验，从事过工业控制，制造执行，生产管理软件（MES、MOM、SCADA、PCS、WMS等）SRM产品直销经验优先 熟悉大型企业及行业的业务运作模式，具备3年以上综合信息化解决方案或软件产品销售经验，有500万金额以上独立运作项目经验，在大型集团性企业或行业有客户资源 熟悉工业互联网、MES、ERP、大数据等相关领域的技术，能够根据客户的实际情况，快速构建符合乃至超越用户预期整体解决方案，并且能够在客户实践中沉淀行业打法，在行业或者区域快速复制 具备良好的市场规划、销售过程管理、内外部资源整合、协同实施推进及生态拓展能力 熟练应用各类办公软件，具备良好的逻辑分析及语言表达能力 敢于接受挑战，抗压能力强；具备较强团队合作精神，为人正直，作风严谨，具有高度的责任感及职业操守 熟悉规模以上工业企业客户，有大型项目实施成功案例者优先 具备独立运作地方工业互联网项目落地能力的优先 Additional Information JOB ID: req297668 Category: Sales Location: Building 1, Lane 555, Huan Ke Road, Zhangjiang,Shanghai,SHANGHAI,201203,China Exempt Global (ALL)

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Hubei
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, ( Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Telecommunications

description: 1. Leading, managing, developing and coaching the sales team to achieve or overachieve sales and unit targets driving profitable growth  2. Understanding customer needs, industry and therapy area changes - Be familiar with the key customer needs in the diabetes management space and stay abreast of market changes and trends. Monitoring, analyzing reporting on competitors’ products and strategies and driving appropriate business response. Anticipating healthcare market developments and translating into sales tactics and successful execution. Be seen as an expert in diabetes.  3. Support the business strategy – Support and execute the marketing & commercial strategy through salesforce excellence. Sales strategy must be focused on target customers and utilize the appropriate communication channels to develop customer loyalty. Sales strategy must support the successful management of distributors and tender gains  4. Salesforce Quality Enhancement - Initiate and facilitate a process of constant improvement and enhancement of performance of the ADC Salesforce. Develop and monitor KPI’s ensuring areas of improvement are highlighted and addressed, analyze statistics, identify trends, issues etc; in order to develop solutions to enhance efficiencies. Be responsible for developing individual coaching plans for the team and take ownership of the plan so that performance is improved. Be responsible for the ADC Salesforce training plan by conducting regular field visits  5. Key Stakeholder Development – Be responsible for key customer stakeholders to identify new business opportunities. Deliver effective product presentations to key stakeholders  6. Ethics and Compliance – Comply with the ethics and compliance policy of the company and uphold its values. Set the standard for your team and implement measures to ensure the teams meet the standards required  7. Budget Management - Responsibility for designated, project-related budgets as appropriate, ensuring they are maintained within spending limits.  8. Metrics – Assess performance of key activities and resource use through effective KPI setting and monitoring

description: The Opportunities  Unity Technologies is looking for a hardworking, upbeat Sales Account Executive to join our growing team. You will help drive success with our strategic customers and prospective customers in China. You will work under the Sales, Director and connect with other key internal & external partners for strategies to drive adoption of the technical Unity platform, solutions, services and build deep and lasting customer partnerships.  What You’ll Be Doing  Identify new strategic partnership opportunities within the vertical Structure, negotiate and close partnerships in order to meet or exceed objectives Responsible for driving revenue and consistently meeting quarterly sales targets Develop a proven pipeline by defining opportunities and market potential, identifying sales leads, and working with internal teams to close accounts Creatively thinking and crafting our strategy around the industries and region, including pricing, products, and market strategies Work with various divisions (including Development, Marketing, Support, Finance and Legal) to gain support for key initiatives and deals What We’re Looking For  Direct sales/business development experience with a proven track record of meeting or exceeding exciting individual revenue targets Comfortable representing a technology company and partnering with CEOs, CTOs, engineers, or other technical staff to build solutions, and at the same time able to structure, develop and execute strategic agreements on the commercial side Strong understanding of potential applications for real-time 3D technology in various industries Life at Unity  Unity (NYSE: U) is the world’s leading platform for creating and operating real-time 3D (RT3D) content. Creators, ranging from game developers to artists, architects, automotive designers, filmmakers, and others, use Unity to make their imaginations come to life. Unity’s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices.  The company’s 1,800+ person research and development team keeps Unity at the forefront of development by working alongside partners to ensure optimized support for the latest releases and platforms. Apps developed by Unity creators were downloaded more than five billion times per month in 2020. For more information, please visit www.unity.com.  Unity is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, disability, gender, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations or accommodations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.  Headhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this website or directly to managers. Unity does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Unity will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Unity.  #SEN

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Dalian
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, (Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.

description: 工作职责KEY RESPONSIBILITIES (not More Than 6 Bullet Points) 完成公司下达的区域内各项指标 Accomplish KPIs for the territory 在药物研发领域建立广泛客户群体以推荐PKI产品及定制服务，独立进行产品展示，客户培训及技术协助，在区域内大力发展新客户，和客户采购部门维持良好业务关系 Establish a network of scientific contacts in pharmas and biotechs to propose the PKI products and services. Establish close relationship with purchasing department 和各个业务部门协调销售订单，物流及库存管理 Coordinate sales order, logistics, and potential inventory management 提供随时更新的销售前瞻预估，使得公司对于整体的产品销售有准确地评判 Prepare and implement sales forecasts in association with management to maximize product line sales and business development 及时发现市场支持需求，给与市场计划合理的建议，参与展会及各种公司支持的业内会议 Identify promotional and other marketing support needs. Contribute to Marketing Plan development. Support trade show promotion by attendance at industry related meetings 提供周报/月报，及时更新客户反馈和问题，以及相应的解决方案 Generate and maintain demonstration reports and monthly customer feedback reports to provide record of technical development work on behalf of customers 职位要求job Requirements 生命科学领域的硕士以上学历 A science degree in a relevant field, Master of Biological Sciences or Ph.D. desirable 至少三年以上在以下业务范围的工作经验，销售，客户技术支持，最好有成功的实验模型开发或细胞培养和发酵的经历 A minimum of three-year experience working in a customer technical support, sales roles, assay development area, or cell fermentation with proven success 对PKI的技术理论有深入的了解，有一定的应用经验 In depth knowledge of theoretical and applied PKI technology 对于市场和客户有整体的理解，可以做到产品线和客户的高度匹配 A solid understanding of the industry and market conditions affecting the territory/product line(s) 强大的谈判和沟通能力 Excellent negotiating skills and strong communication skills both written and oral are also needed 具有在最低限度管理下的独立及主动工作能力 Work under minimal supervision and show highly active attitude 高度的道德和诚信上的自我规范 Demonstrated ethics and integrity 很好的计算机应用水平，包括文档及GraphPad Prism Strong Computer skills, including Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point and GraphPad Prism 较好的英文水平（听，写，说） Fluent in English (reading, writing, and speaking)

jobTitle: REGIONAL SALES MANAGER – NORTH, GREATER CHINA
description: 公司描述  Fermentis works with everyone in the world of beer, wine, spirits and other fermented beverages. Its range of products and services covers almost all professional requirements: from safeguarding production to expressing sensory characteristics. Born in Lille in the North of France, Fermentis is a Business Unit of the Lesaffre Group; global key player in yeasts and fermentation solutions. For over 165 years, Lesaffre has been focused on yeast and fermentation, and all related applications, with currently more than 69 industrial plants and 11,000 employees worldwide.  Fermentis has a recognized know-how in the fermentation industry allowing the development and production of products adapted for beverage applications based on the research of more than 570 R&D experts. Its wide variety of products has been specifically created to meet the quality requirements of fermented beverage producers around the world, focusing on the development of aroma and character.  职位描述  P&L performance  Achieve the targeted sales objectives in terms of revenue.  Budget, sales reporting and analysis  Assist Area Sale Manager (ASM) in the preparation of sales & marketing budget (Budget)  Reports monthly sales results and/or assist in sales analysis upon request.  Reports on the action plan status.  Marketing studies/research  Carry out studies to confirm projected production volumes in the targeted segments, e.g. by assessing economical & political drivers country by country.  Identify and lobby key contacts (influencers, decision-makers), key organizations, technical institutions and associations for each segment.  Carry out field visits to end users and distributors, as per Fermentis definition and requirements (company information, technology, yeast purchases, etc.).  Update customer Database accordingly.  Identify business opportunities and key prospects.  Establish contacts with business/sector related trade organizations, research organizations, other suppliers - as per instructions of ASM.  Monitor competitive activity by identifying and following up competitors organization and product & services offer. Report to ASM.  Technical sales  Visit existing accounts / distributors, target and potential customers (see Yearly Sales Planner) in accordance with the call frequency defined for each market segment (see Yearly Marketing Plan), developing strong relationships with customers.  Deliver technical presentations to customers.  Prepare sales offers in accordance with the guidelines of the ASM.  Provide technical support to direct customers and distributor (technical advice, assistance in trials, operators trainings…). Seek assistance from Technical Sales Support (TSS) in agreement with ASM, as and when required.  Promotion  Identify opportunities of promotion and report to management.  Promote Fermentis products within the trade, highlighting their technical and economic benefits and raising Fermentis as the expert in the industry.  Take an active role in the promotion of products through technical publications, paper and poster presentations, seminars, and participation at international and national trade shows, conferences and seminars - as per instructions of ASM.  Prepare technical presentations for seminars, conferences, tradeshows, etc., according to a specific plan agreed with management.  Seek assistance from Technical Sales Support (in agreement with the ASM), as and when required.  Assist the ASM in the organization of seminars and events with customers / distributors.  Distribution networks  To accomplish yearly objectives and action plans (market coverage, sales objectives, promotional activities, new product development…) with distributors, reporting progress on a quarterly basis.  To provide distributors with continuous technical, commercial and marketing support. Organise training as and when required. Seek assistance from Technical Sales Support (in agreement with the ASM), as and when required.  Sales administration  Liaison with Sales Administration department of each Lesaffre affiliate operating in the territory assigned, and/or other shared services, ensuring good customer service and satisfaction from order capture through to delivery, invoicing and payment.  Quality  To follow up complaints from customers. Liaison with ASM, DOS and/or TSS as and when required.  Others  Other duties may be assigned.  职位要求  Brewing or Distilling education or job experience.  Ideally from other international food ingredient supplier companies  At Least 3 years sales experiences  Prefer base in Beijing, could be basein Shandong and frequently travel to Beijing
industries: Construction, Research, and Food Production

description: Job Description Responsibilities  As a Business Development Representative, you will be responsible to digitally (phone, email and social media) connect with new and existing customers to educate them about PTC’s offerings and identify new business opportunities that will ultimately convert generate revenue. Prospect and develop new accounts while engaging with existing accounts Qualify Inbound leads and develop strong sales campaigns Prospect into white-space accounts to add net new logos Work on customers as part of sales team with Account Executives and Market Directors Accurately record activities (calls, emails, demos, etc.) in SFDC Assist in the execution of demos in your region Engage actively with prospects & customers via social networking sites such as LinkedIn and Twitter Measured on pipeline impact Desired Skills & Experience College degree with strong academic performance Excellent communication skills 2-4 years of professional experience Prior experience working with Japanese B2B Tech customers preferred Professional digital presence Undergone sales methodology training such as BANT, MEDDIC, etc. Ability to prioritize, multi-task and manage time effectively Competitive drive and strong desire for success By submitting your interest in this job, you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application. You will receive up to 6 messages from the number "63879". Message & data rates may apply. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.

description: Senior Sales Manager, West China  Location: Flexible (Chongqing Preferred)   AIOTECH represents Vantiq that is a hot Silicon Valley startup that delivers a software platform to quickly develop and deploy the next generation of applications, applications that manages an ecosystem that consists of real-time devices (IOT, smartphones, tablets,…), legacy applications (Oracle, SAP, Salesforce, etc..), real-time social media feeds, etc... These applications can handle hundreds of thousands of events per second, provides man-machine collaboration, are distributed to any combination of cloud, edge and on-premise and are highly scalable.  AIOTECH (Vantiq) is looking for an extraordinary sales executive who loves joining a hot early stage software startup company and build the business in the region. The ideal candidate has the vision and the track record in building a significant software business in the region, especially in the industries of Energy, State Owned Enterprise (SOE), Local State Subsidized Campus and other public sectors. This position will report to the VP of Sales of Greater China.      The ideal candidate should be comfortable in having relationships with customers and partners at all levels and very important, proven experience in successfully building a partner ecosystem of System Integrators, Resellers and OEMs in a major technology company throughout the region.  Some of the things you’ll be doing include…  Develop business strategy, grow sales and serve customers. Work closely with the VP of Sales of Greater China. Meet & exceed quarterly sales targets. Provide weekly reporting of pipeline and forecast. Define and manage the strategic plan for the growth in the region. You’ll strategize and execute on plans for channel programs, marketing programs and product feedback.  Establish strong channel partners in the region. o  Overview the recruitment and management of local, regional and global partners based in the region. o  Aggressively work to maximize partner total sales potential through best practices, training and support. o  Excellent communication with management, partners, customers and support staff. o  Be responsible for the management and development the partners, providing them with direction, motivation and leadership. o  Create strategic relationships with senior decision makers within our key partners. Provide feedback and coordination to HQ and local team from the region. Provide input, direction and guidance to other staff in the region including Pre-Sales and Marketing. Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products. Participate in sales meetings, product seminars and trade shows as appropriate. Conduct contract negotiations. Travel flexibility --- Travel to partner or customer locations to meet partners and support sales efforts.  Who you are…  Experienced.  Significant direct leadership and strategic partnership experience. You have a solid career history and a proven track record of driving success through partners. Leader. Exceptional management, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills. People want to work with you and for you. Entrepreneurial. You are a creative and strategic thinker. Management Experience. Extensive management skills in software sales including strategic selling. Startup attitude. You have a positive attitude and will “roll up your sleeve” and do what it takes. Energy and Enthusiasm.  You believe in what we’re doing and won’t stop at anything to deliver on your goals. Excellent Communication skills - whether that be to the receptionist or the CEO, your communication style is professional at all times - you know what to say, and how to say it. Problem Solver.  You love tackling the most difficult of challenges and know how to get to the best solution. Executive presence and credibility. Performer.  Proven track record of consistently meeting or exceeding assigned goals and targets. Go-Getter. You thrive in a fast-paced, high growth, rapidly changing environment. Conviction and Commitment. Able to work independently and remotely from other members of your team and corporate. Educated. Bachelor's degree in related field, or equivalent experience. Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products. Participate in team-building and company-growth activities including strategy setting, sales training, marketing efforts and customer care.  About AIOTECH:  AIOTECH’s goal is to provide the best technology platform for enterprises to digitize their business while keeping humans in charge.  The AIOTECH application platform-as-a-service enables users to develop, deploy and run real-time enterprise applications driven by data streams from IoT, connected products, social, enterprise systems of record and people. All applications created with AIOTECH are event-driven, allowing businesses to respond in real-time to any business event.

Key Responsibilities Responsible for sales and profitability in MAT Coatings in East area. Maintains multi-tiered customer relationships and develop relationships between PPG customer. Gathers customer and broad market intelligence and works jointly with MAT team to develop and implement short-term and long-term sales strategies and tactics. Prepares customer business action plans that ensure attainment of sales and profitability objectives. Coordinates with other departments to develops and implements value-added customer solutions. Negotiates contracts, pricing, credit and conflict. Overall Forecasting for region account need. Qualifications At least 5 years sales management experience (account management exposure welcomed) in the coating industry. Business development exposure. Good communication and coordination capacity with good English capability. About Us  Here at PPG we make it happen, and we seek candidates of the highest integrity and professionalism who share our values, with the commitment and drive to strive today to do better than yesterday – everyday.  PPG: WE PROTECT AND BEAUTIFY THE WORLD™  Through leadership in innovation, sustainability and color, PPG helps customers in industrial, transportation, consumer products, and construction markets and aftermarkets to enhance more surfaces in more ways than does any other company.. To learn more, visit www.ppg.com and follow @ PPG on Twitter.  The PPG Way  Every Single Day At PPG  We partner with customers to create mutual value.  We are insightful, dedicated and proactive. We have intimate knowledge of the market and our customers. We focus on practical solutions that make a difference.  We are “One PPG” to the world.  We are better and stronger together. We leverage our scale to reach new markets and introduce innovative technologies as we differentiate and disrupt our markets.  We trust our people every day, in every way.  We enable and empower our people to make the right decisions. We are inclusive, transparent and respectful. Our feedback is clear and actionable.  We make it happen.  We have a passion for winning. We achieve. We deliver with discipline and integrity. We bring our best energy to our work. We decide and act intelligently and quickly.  We run it like we own it.  We respect one another by being responsible and accountable. We always act in the best interest of our company, customers, shareholders and our communities.  We do better today than yesterday – everyday.  We continuously learn. We develop our people to grow our businesses.  PPG Way: (Click here to learn more about the PPG Way)  PPG vision: http://corporate.ppg.com/Our-Company/PPG-Vision.aspx  We are One PPG: http://one.ppg.com/  PPG provides equal opportunity to all candidates and employees. We offer an opportunity to grow and develop your career in an environment that provides a fulfilling workplace for employees, creates an environment for continuous learning, and embraces the ideas and diversity of others. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, pregnancy, race, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability status, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression. If you need assistance to complete your application due to a disability, please email recruiting@ppg.com.  PPG values your feedback on our recruiting process. We encourage you to visit Glassdoor.com and provide feedback on the process, so that we can do better today than yesterday.  Benefits will be discussed with you by your recruiter during the hiring process.

description: We are looking for experienced agents and consultants who are looking to provide their clients with something different. The market has evolved from standard undifferentiated products and we are one of the fastest growing alternative product providers.  About AGRIDevelopments AGRI Developments is a leading private alternative asset company specializing on the agricultural industry. We seek emerging opportunities globally with an objective of delivering long term value in high growth developing sectors within the industry.   As world population increases, the need for more productive and sustainable uses of land becomes more urgent. By 2050 Earth will need to produce 70% more food to feed an additional 2.5 billion people, whilst arable land decreases. AGRI Developments, in support of the world’s needs, always aims to do more with less. By creating more value with less risk, by producing more crops from less land and generating more business with less of an ecological footprint.  The Role: Part time / Full time Fully commissioned role (commission rates to be negotiated)  Responsibilities: Provide information regarding our new project to interested individuals Develop and manage your portfolio of clients  Qualifications: A minimum of 5-year experience Existing and developed network of potential clients and/or other agents Highly developed relationship management skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Mature and self-confident  Support: All necessary training if necessary will be provided You will receive the support of our entire team from existing agents and operations to back office Clients will be provided to experienced agents  Work Experience: This role is ideal for people involved in similar sectors as the skills necessary overlap: investment and wealth management consultants, pension and life insurance agents, real estate agents, residency & citizenship planning agents.

description: As our new Business Development Manager based in Beijing you will be responsible for acquisition of new clients. You will drive business development efforts that generate leads, enhance brand visibility, and increase sales. In addition to personal sales goals and assigned targets, you will be pivotal in winning business to reach targeted goals by ensuring that leads are exchanged, relationships are managed, and clients are given a seamless experience — working with the international business development team, as well as Space Matrix offices in Asia and the US.  Specific Responsibilities You will prospect for potential new clients and generate new leads and track leads and forecast your sales efforts to create new bookings. You will Drive business development efforts in the region, acquire new clients and manage sales targets . Gather market intelligence, including information on clients and competitors in the Workplace Market Sector, industry trends, future projects, etc You will develop and take part in pitches and other presentations that meet the client’s needs and expectations. You will Work closely with the MD and the team to complete the sales cycle. You will Represent Space Matrix by targeting potential clients, project partners, and collaborators; identifying opportunities; building relationships to expand Space Matrix’s competitive position. Requirements  In addition to experience within the real estate facilities and/or "corporate workplace" market sector in Shanghai, this position requires strategic thinking, quick problem-solving skills, excellent interpersonal and communication skills, digital media experience, and real business acumen.  Does this describe you You are a highly driven and motivated sales / business development professional. You have excellent oral and written communication skills. You have experience in managing complex sales cycle with B2B selling process. You have Undergraduate or graduate degree in business, marketing, or another field relevant to this role, with a minimum of 6 years of sales/ business development experience. You have Knowledge of the Workplace Market Sector in China including competitive positioning and strategy. You have Experience working in Architecture, Interior Design firms or related fields. Our Culture  We can offer motivated individuals who are prepared to confront head-on whatever comes their way. Members describe our company culture as collaborative, innovative, progressive, honest and fast. We perceive this as a nurturing, caring and continually maturing family; but which is also is a little chaotic at times, refreshingly apolitical, flexible and friendly.  About Space Matrix  Space Matrix design is a dynamic and agile 21st-century digital enterprise with a major client focus to deliver a profitable, sustainable and future-ready workplace solutions. We are continuing to revolutionise the delivery of design+build services in Asia with multiple offices across Australia, India, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam. Space Matrix is number 10 in office design, globally and ranks No. 2 in Asia according to Interior Design Magazine’s 2015 Top 100 Interior Design Giants Survey.  To find out more visit www.spacematrix.
industries: Architecture & Planning, Design, and Management Consulting

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Dalian
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, (Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Telecommunications

description: Overview Autodesk is seeking a dynamic high-energy Sales Manager with sound business acumen, natural sales instincts and strong technical aptitude to lead our office-based sales team of Business Development Representative (BDR) and Sales Development Representative(SDR). Your primary focus will be on leading, coaching and developing your team to over-achieve sales targets, excel in customer satisfaction, and reach new heights of professional development.  Responsibilities 1)      Lead the activities of SDR/BDR team, including hiring, coaching, developing talent, team culture and performance management.  2)      Collaborate with Marketing to build campaigns that ensure lead quality and quantity with proper closed-loop metric reporting. 3)      Develop and leverage relationships with channel partners to improve all territory performance to exceed customers’ expectations. 4)      Regularly report on team and individual results: pipeline, conversion rates, and billings attainment. 5)      Collaborate with internal sales operations stakeholders on reporting and analysis.  6)      Identify and make recommendations for improvement in sales productivity. 7)      Chart and deliver timely and accurate forecasting and pipeline management. 8)      Encourage innovation by exchanging new ideas to improve operation and efficiency within sales and the supporting organizations.  Minimum Qualifications: 1)      Fluency in English and Chinese is a must 2)      Proven experience in successfully managing people to achieve performance goals within an inbound and outbound office-based sales team 3)      Strong metrics and analytical orientation; Strong problem-solving skill 4)      Outstanding communication, organizational and time management skills 5)      Prior inside sales experience a plus with a strong desire to be in technology sales 6)      Proven experience in sales a plus, preferably in enterprise applications, with a proven track record of over-achievement of quota expectations.
industries: Computer Software, Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, and Information Technology and Services

description: Business Unit – Sales Operations  Reports To – Sales Operations Leader  Your Team / Your Role  Supporting the commercial function of the business, the Sales Operations team play the backbone role to ensure seamless transactions spanning within the entire sales cycle. You will be working with a small team within the commercial function, to be based at the head office of China.  A Typical Day  The position provides support to the entire Sales department of China. The specialist role is responsible for maintaining relationships with sales channels, manufacturing, marketing/merchandising, product line, and supply chain. This role provides support to multiple functions with resolving issues and conflicts that could impact customers and their experience.  Some aspects of the job includes (but not limited to): Provide support to execute sales plans according to company strategic goals Manage sales, supply, and demand analysis, and constraints within the sales cycle Develop, manage, and maintain regular sales reports Support in tracking order delivery and fulfillment Perform complex ad hoc analysis as required Minimum Qualification  Who You Are A seasoned sales operations specialist who understands complex product mix and sales strategies Familiar with sales forecast & planning, able to capture key information from massive data report, and convert data into convincible narratives Customer services and team player Attention to details Advanced user of Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and Word Language proficiency in both English and Mandarin Chinese At least 3 years of work experience in multinational company setup from FMCG, Consumer Goods, Manufacturing, or Retails industries Keeping you Healthy and Safe  We want you to return home in even better shape than when you started, so we need you to help us do this by making sure you follow a few simple steps. We need you to: Make sure you take reasonable care for your own health and safety, and Take reasonable care that what you do (or what you don’t do when you should have) doesn’t affect the health and safety of others, and Follow reasonable instructions that we might give from time-to-time, such as reporting incidents and hazards, and Follow policies or procedures, so long as it’s reasonable and we’ve told you about it, and Attend training that helps you to work safely
industries: Consumer Goods
